Package distibuted

Class ServerEndpoint

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
distibuted.ServerEndpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameController, ServerController, ServerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class ServerEndpoint extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ServerInterface
This class is an implementation of ServerInterface and represents the server endpoint for socket and RMI connections
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerEndpoint

      public ServerEndpoint(ServerController serverController, GameManagerController gameManagerController, Consumer<String> disconnectionCallback) throws RemoteException
      This class constructor crates an instance of this class with a given ServerController, GameManagerController and null GameController
      Parameters:
      serverController - a given server controller
      gameManagerController - a given game manager controller
      disconnectionCallback - a callback to be called when the client disconnects
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in case of an error occurred exporting this remote object

    • ping

      public void ping() throws RemoteException
      This method is used to ping the server

      It notifies the ping handler Thread that a ping has been received

      Specified by:
      ping in interface ServerInterface
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the ping fails
